Description:
Detects the execution of PowerShell with a specific flag sequence that is used by the Wmiexec script

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Wmiexec Default Powershell Command
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where command like '%-nop -nol -sta -noni -w hidden -exec bypass -enc%'
